summary: SEVERAL TIMES THE VEHICLE WOULDN'T START, I HAD TO HAVE IT JUMP STARTED.  USUALLY HAPPENED AFTER IT HAD BEEN DRIVEN FOR A SHORT TIME, STOPPED AND THEN TRIED TO RESTART.  ONE TIME IT WOULDN'T START EVEN WITH A JUMP.  BATTERY WAS REPLACED AND IT CONTINUED TO HAPPEN.  DEALERSHIP COULD NOT DUPLICATE THE PROBLEM.  ALL READINGS FOR BATTERY AND ALTERNATOR CAME BACK NORMAL.*JB
